We have made our way through the requested updates and some items require additional information from the client. Both complete and pending items can be found in the following Google Sheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pDDL8S3SbMIyPfZ1X0WIG8UhxZ97yVJFmquuz_h3Pdk/edit?usp=sharing

We have used 1 hour and 45 minutes of support time on this task.

- photos 2(23), 2(24,), 4(1), 3(8) are not included on the folder (Photo Update.docx)
- on the Website Update.docx many images are to 'be removed' but they didn't include which image to use.
page 3, 4, 5, 10
- on page 11, not clear what 'Correct Name:' means
- on page 12 'Change photo:' does not indicate which image to use
- on page 13, no replacement photo is indicated
       what does 'remove subfolder' mean
- on page 14, no replacement photo is indicated
- on page 15, no replacement photo is indicated

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath/Chris,

Clients need to urgently make changes to their website that they are pretty fixated on. They call me daily and I really need your help to get them off my back with the potential to win a rebuild in early 2024.

All required assets (photos) including the changes (word doc) they have requested are in the Dropbox folder which I have linked you below. Please begin to immediately action as much of these as you can and reach out if anything requires further clarification.

https://www.dropbox.com/t/npnf3cVBH5AUDumU

Much appreciated,
Dimitri

--

Dimitri Galanis
Director & Strategist
T: (02) 9171 4990 | M: 0419 707 061
